Module health.py¶

This module provides classes made to store entitys health. This is useful for padronizing the way some entity, be an enemy or be a player, takes damage. It also helps putting the player health in the screen.

class src.health.Health(max_health, immunity_time=0)¶

Class that represents the health of an entity.

decrease(amount: int | float)¶

Decreases the current health by the specified amount, taking into account immunity time.

Parameters:

amount (int or float) – The amount to decrease the health by.

get_health()¶

Returns the current health value.

Returns:

The current health value.

Return type:

int

increase(amount: int | float)¶

Increases the current health by the specified amount.

Parameters:

amount (int or float) – The amount to decrease the health by.

class src.health.PlayerHealth(max_health, immunity_time=0)¶

Class that represents the health of the player.

decrease(amount)¶

Decreases the player’s health by the specified amount.

Parameters:

amount (int)) – The amount to decrease the health by.

update()¶

Updates the health bar based on the current health.
